entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
